statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECSCluster)-[:HAS_CONTAINER_INSTANCE]->(:ECSContainerInstance)-[r:HAS_TASK]->(:ECSTask) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECSCluster)-[:HAS_CONTAINER_INSTANCE]->(n:ECSContainerInstance) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECSCluster)-[:HAS_SERVICE]->(n:ECSService) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECSCluster)-[:HAS_TASK]->(:ECSTask)-[:HAS_CONTAINER]->(n:ECSContainer) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECSCluster)-[:HAS_TASK]->(n:ECSTask) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:ECSTaskDefinition)-[:HAS_CONTAINER_DEFINITION]->(n:ECSContainerDefinition) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:ECSTaskDefinition) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:ECSCluster) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
